responses: Hi there, how can I help?

patterns: how I can calculate the GPA

responses: Grade => GPA e A=>3.5 & B=>2.5 & C=>1.5 & D=>1 & F=>0 or A -> Excellent & B -> Very Good & C -> Good & D -> Fair & F -> Fail

patterns: How many credit hours are needed for every level
How many credit hours are needed to reach the level
responses: First level -> less than 32 credit hour , Second level -> from 32 to 64 credit hour , Third level -> from 64 to 96 credit hour , Forth level -> from 96 to 146 credit hour

patterns: How many hours do I need to specialize in a department?
Number of hours required for specialization?
How do I specialize in a department?
responses: After 32 credit hours, you can specialize
